title: LIVE FROM PHILADELPHIA: 11 Shot in BLM Riots! | Ep 59 | Good Morning #MugClub
description: Steven recaps yesterday’s Big Tech hearing before the Senate, then covers the latest riots in Philadelphia. We then go live, on the ground in Philadelphia, with BlazeTV correspondent Elijah Schaffer to hear about his being attacked by looters and survey the destruction firsthand.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
